title: Ticket #5684: python bindings for condor_q v3 query can't do all v8.5 features
description:
The condor_q command for 8.5.x has been enhanced to do only-my-jobs and to request that the schedd do aggregation on the fly. The python bindings need to be enhanced in the same way.

The relevant code in condor_q.cpp is 

if (fetch_opts == fetch_DefaultAutoCluster) {
   ad.InsertAttr("QueryDefaultAutocluster", true);
   ad.InsertAttr("MaxReturnedJobIds", 2); // TODO: make this settable by caller
} else if (fetch_opts == fetch_GroupBy) {
   ad.InsertAttr("ProjectionIsGroupBy", true);
   ad.InsertAttr("MaxReturnedJobIds", 2); // TODO: make this settable by caller
 } else if (fetch_opts == fetch_MyJobs) {
   const char * owner = my_username();
   if (owner) { ad.InsertAttr("Me", owner); }
   ad.InsertAttr("MyJobs", owner ? "(Owner == Me)" : "true");
   ....

the python bindings need equivalent attributes set into the query classad.
remarks:
2018-Jun-26 11:35:13 by tannenba:
Abandoning this ticket, as it is dealt with in #6619
creator: johnkn
